From: Wendy Lockman <wlockman@ra1.randomc.com>
Date: Tue, 26 Mar 1996 09:14:35 -0500 Preheat oven to 350F. Combine tofu & macaroni. Place in a baking dish. Pour gravy over the mixture & bake 20 minutes.
